VHSL: Foundations for Coaching in All Three Dimensions

$29.00

Course Objectives

The VHSL and 3DI have partnered to create this new course designed to satisfy the coaching principles portion of VHSL’s coaches education mandate.

  • Gain a high-level understanding of the 3D Coaching Framework
  • Learn about SHAPE America’s National Standards for Sports Coaches as processed through the 3D Framework
  • Understand how to maximize your athletes potential on and off the field

Duration: 1 H 50 M

About the 3D Framework

3D is a framework for coaching, built on a foundation of purpose. Once coaches have clearly discerned their purpose for coaching, the 3D framework will help them fulfill their purpose by enacting practical strategies to engage their athletes in all dimensions of their being: skillset, mindset, and heartset.

The 3D Coaching framework was developed by Dr. Jeff Duke, E.D.d. of the 3D Institute. This simple framework empowers coaches to maximize the performance of their athletes and fulfill their purpose for coaching. Utilizing the framework helps them to be intentional about becoming:

  • Fundamentally sound (1st Dimension)
  • Skilled at coaching the mind (2nd Dimension)
  • Focused on developing the heart (3rd Dimension)

Click on the “Course Content” tab to check out a free module.

Before Submitting a request, Please try the following steps on your regular browser:

1. Logout of the site
2. Clear your cache (Temporary Internet files)
3. Log back in

If that doesn’t fix it, please try to open a different browser to see if it loads correctly there. For Example, if you are using Chrome, Please try to open a Safari, Firefox or Edge window.
